title: Česká Škola T.G. Masaryka | Czech and Slovak Association, Inc ...
snippet: Česká víkendová škola T.G. Masaryka se schází každou druhou sobotu odpoledne ve Fidelity House v Arlingtonu. Škola je otevřená všem studentům ve věku od 5 do 18 ...

title: Czech School of Los Angeles | Česká jazyková škola v Los Angeles
snippet: Czech School of Los Angeles offers Czech language classes for children and adults in Los Angeles area as well as translation services by native speakers.

title: Czech and Slovak School
snippet: The Czech and Slovak School of Sokol Washington offers children language and grammar instruction, and lessons in history, traditions, music and folklore.
